title: The Dark Knight - How to Be a Hero in an Upside Down World.
description:
We look at how Batman in The Dark Knight shows us how to be a hero in an upside down world in the scene where kidnappers dress up their victims as perpetrators.  We compare this story to Christ turning the tables over in the Temple to chase away the money changers. 

The video was edited by Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt of the Storytellers channel.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbphDfwSJmxk1Ny_3Oicrng

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/
